solution_line_template: Cornelia visited {total_countries} countries - {europe_countries} countries - {south_america_countries} countries = <<{total_countries}-{europe_countries}-{south_america_countries}={remaining_countries}>>{remaining_countries} countries which were outside of Europe and South America.

Half of those {remaining_countries} countries were in Asia, so there were {remaining_countries} countries / {half_divisor} = <<{remaining_countries}/{half_divisor}={asian_countries}>>{asian_countries} Asian countries that Cornelia visited.
